name: mina-signer
description: Node API for signing transactions on various networks for Mina Protocol

scripts.build: tsc && cp src/client_sdk.bc.js dist/src && cp src/plonk_wasm.js dist/src && cp src/plonk_wasm_bg.wasm dist/src
scripts.copy-wasm: cp ../../_build/default/src/lib/crypto/kimchi_bindings/js/node_js/plonk_wasm.js src && cp ../../_build/default/src/lib/crypto/kimchi_bindings/js/node_js/plonk_wasm_bg.wasm src && npm run chmod-wasm
scripts.test: for f in ./tests/*.test.ts; do jest $f || exit 1; done
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run make-jsoo && npm run copy-wasm && npm run build && npm run test

author: o1labs
